kert:test-plan.kert:description: Test plan for EXPath Cryptographic Module

kert:test.kert:author: Claudius Teodorescu
kert:test.kert:title: Generate enveloped digital signature
kert:test.kert:description: Generate an enveloped digital signature for an XML document by using the following parameters: 'SHA1' canonicalization algorithm, 'DSA_SHA1' signature algorithm, 'dsig' signature namespace prefix, and an X509 certificate.

kert:test.kert:author: Claudius Teodorescu
kert:test.kert:title: Validate enveloped digital signature
kert:test.kert:description: Validate an enveloped digital signature, which is generated by using the following parameters: 'SHA1' canonicalization algorithm, 'DSA_SHA1' signature algorithm, 'dsig' signature namespace prefix, and an X509 certificate.

kert:test.kert:author: Claudius Teodorescu
kert:test.kert:title: Symmetric encryption of string, AES/CBC/PKCS5Padding
kert:test.kert:description: Symmetric encryption of a string with AES/CBC/PKCS5Padding transformation, and 128 bytes key.

kert:test.kert:author: Claudius Teodorescu
kert:test.kert:title: Symmetric encryption of string, AES/CBC/PKCS5Padding, default provider
kert:test.kert:description: Symmetric encryption of a string with AES/CBC/PKCS5Padding transformation, 128 bytes key, and default provider.

kert:test.kert:author: Claudius Teodorescu
kert:test.kert:title: Symmetric encryption of string, AES
kert:test.kert:description: Symmetric encryption of a string with AES transformation (implicit ECB mode), and 128 bytes key.

kert:test.kert:title: Symmetric encryption of string, AES/CBC/PKCS5Padding, wrong key

kert:test.kert:author: Claudius Teodorescu
kert:test.kert:title: Symmetric decryption of string, AES/CBC/PKCS5Padding
kert:test.kert:description: Symmetric decryption of a string with AES/CBC/PKCS5Padding transformation, and 128 bytes key.

kert:test.kert:author: Claudius Teodorescu
kert:test.kert:title: Symmetric decryption of string, AES/CBC/PKCS5Padding, default provider
kert:test.kert:description: Symmetric decryption of a string with AES/CBC/PKCS5Padding transformation, 128 bytes key, and default provider.

kert:test.kert:author: Claudius Teodorescu
kert:test.kert:title: Symmetric decryption of string, AES
kert:test.kert:description: Symmetric decryption of a string with AES transformation (implicit ECB mode), and 128 bytes key.

kert:test.kert:author: Claudius Teodorescu
kert:test.kert:title: Error message for symmetric encryption of string
kert:test.kert:description: Symmetric encryption of string ' Test! ' with AES algorithm and 136 key (testing with a wrong key, to see the error message).
